body:
I know I already made a topic like this a month ago,
but I didn't get much help from that.
So I have my screenshots, but I don't know how
to use Imgur to upload them to Avicus.
Help please!
~DiamondPorkchop3
body_tagged:

title: Imgur Help.

replies.body: k When you have an image, right click on it (In imgur) And press "Open image in new tab" Then go to that tab, copy the link, then inthe posts where u pick stuff, go to the mountain button like that looks like a photo, then put the link in that and BAM! :3
replies.body_tagged: k When you have an image, right click on it (In imgur) And press "Open image in new tab" Then go to that tab, copy the link, then inthe posts where u pick stuff, go to the mountain button like that looks like a photo, then put the link in that and BAM! :3

replies.body: Heey look in the player report section, there is a imgur guide from awesome_apricot.
